name: The Sheep
description:
For the best experience, download the game to your computer.

"You are a doctor on board a humanitarian aid ship which is heading for the territories affected by a new strain of the plague. Horrifying events unfold after one supply crate goes missing and the Captain’s indifference causes tension among the crew."

Short game made during Write the Game V4 programme in summer of 2019 by group mentored by Jakub Rokosz and Karolina Kuzia-Rokosz consisting of:

Míla Brousil

Boris Brnčal

Magda Cichoń

Pranavsingh Dhunnoo

Kristýna Hrabalová

Miła Rachwał

Przemek Zieliński

In Kraków, 4th - 15th August 2019
